text: Seems strange to me that I cannot `add` a private package, if it depends on some other private packages, even if there is `Manifest.toml` file included with an exact private package url. Julia just cannot resolve versions for private packages, so I need manually add them one by one in the same env...

text: It sounds like you need to setup a private registry.

elements.text: It sounds like you need to setup a private registry.
